overview: BKFC 42 took place Friday, May 12, 2023 with 11 fights at Bon Secours Wellness Arena in Greenville, South Carolina, USA. The main event of the evening featured a light heavyweight clash between undefeated BKFC contender Tony Soto and former BKFC champion Tyler Goodjohn.
title: BKFC 42: Soto vs. Goodjohn
